StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Data Scientist with 1.5+ years of experience, executing data-driven solutions to deliver business insights efficiently & accurately using predictive modelling & data mining algorithms. Willing to learn new skills to improve my abilities and to contribute my organisation.

PositionHistory.Title: Data Scientist
PositionHistory.Description: Risk Assessment of Country-by-Country Reporting (CbCR) Schema was designed by studying CbCR schema guide and extracted data to csv from xml files for both inbound & outbound. Latest data was compared with old data to keep new & revised records and delete repeated records. Performed deficiency analysis to find discrepancies in data & text analysis on additional info data to fetch multiplication factor. Calculated Indian footprint & made rules and applied to identify high risk jurisdictions and MNEs. Tools & Techniques: Python, NumPy, Excel

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 38% of this job

EmployerOrg.EmployerOrgName: AI-ML-NLP LAB, Dept. Of Computer Science

PositionHistory.Title: Junior Research Fellow

OrgName.OrganizationName: AI-ML-NLP LAB, Dept. Of Computer Science

PositionHistory.Description:
Developing MM-NAEMO: an multimodal many-objective optimization algorithm. It is based on Genetic algorithm, developed to solve MMO problems from CEC2019 competition.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 8151b1a0d61544c1001011702154e6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580666732 2/2/20 19'06
Achieved 5th position in accuracy using MM-NAEMO & published in IEEE Xplore as a paper. Usefull for Automatic text summarization, feature selection, numerical optimization etc. Tools & Techniques: Python, Matlab, Niching, Selection, Mutation, Cross-over, GMM

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 44% of this job

Calculated Indian footprint & made rules and applied to identify high risk jurisdictions and MNEs. Tools & Techniques: Python, NumPy, Excel
